name: Spear
description: A long stick with a pointy end, every soldiers standard Weapon

name: Old Pitchfork
description: Jesus told us to turn swords into ploughs. We are gonna do the opposite

name: Shortsword
description: A versatile, sharp piece of metal.

name: Zweihander
description: A very long sharp piece of metal. When you want to cut a lot of people at the same time

name: Warhammer
description: A hammer but for war. Especially effective against armored enemies

name: Flail
description: A mace but with a chain. Why and how? No one quite knows.

name: Stone
description: Anything can be a weapon if you hit hard enough.

name: Fancy Hat
description: You do not need head protection and want your opponent to know it.

name: Leathercap
description: Head wear fashioned from a dead cow. Offers light protection.

name: Full Helmet
description: Full Metal Helmet. Excellent Protection at the cost of sight.

name: Gambeson
description: Woven together shirts. Affordable body protection even for the peasants.

name: Leather Armor
description: Body armor made from leather. Decent protection while remaining light

name: Full Plate
description: Full suit of armor made from steel. The mediaval equivalent to a tank.

name: Longbow
description: Curved piece of wood with a string. You can shoot arrows with this

name: Round Shield
description: Medium sized shield made from wood.
